name: Pist Trust
description: PIST-TRUST is authorized by Singapore and Korean bank for supporting blockchain technology in bank and financial system, which has two tokens: PIST (governance token) and P-PASS (KRW-pegged stablecoin) PIST is a governance token in the ecosystem, used for exchanging into KRW based stablecoin,P-Pass, and transaction fees. By using PIST token to swap the P-PASS, PIST-TRUST can authorize other tokens and coins for connecting to the real economy.
